lead_paragraph: On a wind-blown day that yielded no more than five scores under par, Hee Young Park and Beth Bader shot two-under-par 69s to share the first-round lead in the SemGroup Championship in Broken Arrow, Okla. Lorena Ochoa, trying to win her record fifth straight tournament, shot two-over 73 in gusts that reached 36 miles per hour. It was her second round over par this year.
